item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography I am a PhD candidate in the Department of ECE at University of Alberta, advised by Dr. Di Niu. I am funded by AIGSS and Dept. of ECE, University of Alberta. My primary research interest is distributed machine learning, especially distributed optimization for large-scale machine learning applications. I obtained my masterâ€™s degree from Xidian University, advised by Prof. Ning Cai, and bachelorâ€™s degree also from Xidian University.
